refnamediv.refpurpose: split a file into sections determined by context lines

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Output pieces of FILE separated by PATTERN(s) to files 'xx00', 'xx01', ..., and output byte counts of each piece to standard output.
Mandatory arguments to long options are mandatory for short options too.

listitem.para: do not remove output files on errors
use specified number of digits instead of 2
do not print counts of output file sizes
Read standard input if FILE is -. Each PATTERN may be:
copy up to but not including specified line number
copy up to but not including a matching line
skip to, but not including a matching line
repeat the previous pattern specified number of times
repeat the previous pattern as many times as possible
A line OFFSET is a required '+' or '-' followed by a positive integer.
